Package com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.command

Interface IAppVersionCommandService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppVersionCommandService
public interface IAppVersionCommandService
Contains handler methods for events created by the Taxonomy and Rating service and methods for mutating application version annotations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deleteApplicationVersionAnnotation​(AppType appType, java.lang.Long appVersionId, java.lang.Long appVersionAnnotationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Deletes a given application version annotation
    void handleChangedAppVersionTaxonomyClassScore​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData)
    Handels a "score_changed" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppScoreEventDto.
    void handleDeletedAppVersionTaxonomyClass​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType type)
    Handels a "[application_type]_version_taxonomy_class_deleted" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto.
    void handleInsertedAppVersionTaxonomyClass​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType type)
    Handels a "[application_type]_version_taxonomy_class_added" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto and transformed in a AppVersionTaxonomyClass entity.
    java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertApplicationVersionAnnotation​(InsertAppVersionAnnotationDto appVersionAnnotation, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Inserts a new application version annotation for a given enterprise.
    java.lang.Boolean updateApplicationVersionAnnotation​(AppType appType, java.lang.Long appVersionId, java.lang.Long appVersionAnnotationId, UpdateAppVersionAnnotationDto appVersionAnnotation, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Updates an existing application version annotations for a given enterprise.

  • Method Details

    • handleInsertedAppVersionTaxonomyClass

      void handleInsertedAppVersionTaxonomyClass​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType type) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application_type]_version_taxonomy_class_added" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto and transformed in a AppVersionTaxonomyClass entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application data
      type - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto.

    • handleDeletedAppVersionTaxonomyClass

      void handleDeletedAppVersionTaxonomyClass​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData, AppType type) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "[application_type]_version_taxonomy_class_deleted" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto. The application version is fetched using the event data and the deleted taxonomy class are removed from the application version. Then the updated entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application data
      type - the application type
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppVersionTaxonomyClassEventDto.

    • handleChangedAppVersionTaxonomyClassScore

      void handleChangedAppVersionTaxonomyClassScore​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode appData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "score_changed" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an AppScoreEventDto. The application version is fetched using the event data. The CUSL score related attributes are updated. Then the updated entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      appData - the event application data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the appData cannot be converted to a AppScoreEventDto.

    • insertApplicationVersionAnnotation

      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertApplicationVersionAnnotation​(InsertAppVersionAnnotationDto appVersionAnnotation, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Inserts a new application version annotation for a given enterprise.
      Parameters:
      appVersionAnnotation - the application version and annotation data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the application version annotation id, if the application version exists and the annotation is successfully added;
      an empty Optional otherwise;

    • updateApplicationVersionAnnotation

      java.lang.Boolean updateApplicationVersionAnnotation​(AppType appType, java.lang.Long appVersionId, java.lang.Long appVersionAnnotationId, UpdateAppVersionAnnotationDto appVersionAnnotation, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Updates an existing application version annotations for a given enterprise.
      Parameters:
      appType - the application type
      appVersionId - the application version id
      appVersionAnnotationId - the application version annotation id
      appVersionAnnotation - the annotation data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True, if the application version annotation exists and is successfully updated;
      False otherwise;

    • deleteApplicationVersionAnnotation

      java.lang.Boolean deleteApplicationVersionAnnotation​(AppType appType, java.lang.Long appVersionId, java.lang.Long appVersionAnnotationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Deletes a given application version annotation
      Parameters:
      appType - the application type
      appVersionId - the application version id
      appVersionAnnotationId - the application version annotation id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the application version annotation is successfully deleted;
      False otherwise;
